features: 24HR RENEWING MICROMOISTURE: Dove Deep Moisture Body Wash gently cleanses and deeply moisturizes the skin, leaving it renewed and healthy-looking for 24 hours
FOR SOFT, SMOOTH SKIN: Our deeply moisturizing body wash, formulated with millions of MicroMoisture droplets, leaves skin soft as silk
NOURISHES THE DRIEST SKIN: Dove Deep Moisture Body Wash for dry skin actively regenerates skin’s natural moisture and deeply nourishes the driest skin, leaving it soft and hydrated
HOW TO USE: Squeeze a generous amount of Dove Deep Moisture Body Wash into your palms. Massage the moisturizing body wash onto your skin, taking a moment to enjoy the rich lather before rinsing off

DERMATOLOGIST-RECOMMENDED BODY WASH BRAND: From the dermatologist-recommended body wash brand, this body wash, made with plant-based moisturizers, gently cleanses your skin and nourishes its microbiome
body.description: Transform your skin with Dove Deep Moisture Body Wash. This nourishing body wash, with 24hr Renewing MicroMoisture, gently cleanses and deeply moisturizes the skin, leaving it renewed and healthy-looking for 24 hours. From the No.1 dermatologist recommended body wash brand, this nourishing body wash has a luxurious lather you'll love to use in the shower after a long day. Dove Deep Moisture Body Wash has been developed with millions of MicroMoisture droplets and plant-based moisturizers, creating a formula that works to gently cleanse and deeply moisturize skin and nourish your microbiome – skin's living protective layer. Dove Deep Moisture Body Wash for dry skin actively regenerates skin's natural moisture and deeply nourishes the driest skin, leaving it soft and hydrated. As a specially designed body wash for soft skin, your skin will feel as soft as it looks. This moisturizing body wash also has a 98% biodegradable formula*. *98% of ingredients break down into carbon dioxide, water and minerals (OECD test methods 301, 302 and/or 310).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dove Deep Moisture Body Wash actively regenerates skin's natural moisture and deeply nourishes the driest skin, leaving it renewed and healthy-looking for 24 hours.

Change is Beautiful Our best-ever Dove body wash, now with a new look. Experience the Power of MicroMoisture Our new parented body wash deposits millions of tiny moisturizing droplets that absorb deeply into the nooks and crevices of dry skin. Gentle and Moisturizing Body Wash Made with 100% gentle cleansers, Dove body wash is gentle to your skin's microbiome and regenerates moisture for 24 hours of silky - soft skin. Choose Your Favorite Dove has a range of body washes for everyone and every skin type. Start your day with Dove for smooth, nourished skin.

Dove Glowing Mango Butter and Almond Butter Body Wash, 22 oz Dove Deep Moisture Instant Foaming Body Wash, 13.5 oz Dove Crushed Macadamia & Rice Milk Exfoliating Body Polish, 10.5 oz Main Benefit Dove Glowing Mango Butter and Almond Butter Body Wash nourishes dull and dry skin to give you radiant skin in just one shower. Help skin feel clean and moisturized with this gently cleansing and nourishing shower foam. Polish your skin with this nourishing body exfoliator for silky smooth skin with an indulgent scent of macadamia.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Skin so soft
reviews.reviewText: I recently had the opportunity to try out the Dove Body Wash with Pump Deep Moisture for Dry Skin, and I have to say, I am extremely impressed with this product.First and foremost, the packaging is very convenient and practical. The pump makes it easy to dispense just the right amount of product, without any mess or wastage. The 30.6 oz size is also a great value for the price, and ensures that I won't be running out of this body wash anytime soon.As someone with dry skin, I am always on the lookout for products that will help nourish and moisturize my skin. This body wash definitely does the job! The 24hr Renewing MicroMoisture formula leaves my skin feeling incredibly soft and hydrated, even hours after showering. I have even noticed a significant improvement in the dry patches on my elbows and knees since using this body wash.The scent of this body wash is also a major selling point for me. It has a light and refreshing fragrance that is not overpowering, yet still leaves a pleasant scent on my skin. It's perfect for someone who prefers a more subtle scent in their skincare products.Another great thing about this body wash is that it is suitable for all skin types. I have sensitive skin and have had no issues with irritation or harsh reactions. It is also gentle enough for daily use and does not strip the skin of its natural oils.Overall, I would highly recommend the Dove Body Wash with Pump Deep Moisture for Dry Skin to anyone looking for a moisturizing body wash that delivers on its promises. It has quickly become a staple in my skincare routine and I can't imagine going back to any other body wash. Thank you Dove for creating such a fantastic product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great to use in place of shaving cream
reviews.reviewText: As someone who takes their skincare routine seriously, I decided to try Dove's body wash, and I was thoroughly impressed. This product's quality is incredibly gentle, nourishing, and affordable, making it an excellent option for anyone looking to elevate their daily shower routine.One of the standout features of this body wash is its ability to double as a shaving cream. I was initially skeptical, but it works wonders after giving it a try. The formula is incredibly creamy and helps create a smooth surface for shaving, leaving my skin feeling silky soft, and moisturized.The best part of this body wash is the scent. It's truly unique - a delicate blend of floral and fruity notes that leaves my skin smelling fresh and clean for hours.Overall, I highly recommend Dove's body wash to anyone looking for a high-quality, affordable, multipurpose shower product. It's a true game-changer that will leave you feeling pampered and refreshed every time you use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Leaves us soft and clean
reviews.reviewText: We use this daily and it feels like it leaves our skin soft and clean. It doesn't have an overwhelming scent just a general soap scent. Good value for price and we like the pump feature to help the kids not overuse the soap helping it last longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this product. My skin is very sensitive and dry. This is one of very few products that I am able to use. It has a mild scent, which I like. My skin feels moisturized after use. And most importantly, my skin doesn't have a bad reaction to it. I use this product every day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super thick and keeps skin protected
reviews.reviewText: This lotion works well if you’re looking for a protective barrier to keep skin moisturized. It does not easily ‘absorb’ like some other lotions, but does counteract dryness by creating a lasting feeling barrier. Put it on after shower or it may feel too sticky or “thick” for some. I personally like it and will continue to use it as a body lotion for very dry skin areas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not harsh / cleans well
reviews.reviewText: I have used Dove for years. It is good for sensitive skin and has a pleasant scent. With the liquid form it is easier for children use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lasting and effective moisturizer with a good price
reviews.reviewText: Great body wash that replaces soap in the shower and leaves my skin feeling moisturized for a long time. Before my skin was always itchy due to dry skin. After using this product my skin no longer feels itchy. Also the 30.6 Fl oz product is pretty big and has lasted for quite awhile. I use about 1-2 pumps onto a shower towel each time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fresh, clean, great lather
reviews.reviewText: It lathers really nicely. The scent is a nice fresh clean soap scent, which I really like. Feels really nice.

reviews.reviewTitle: A Luxurious Treat for Your Skin
reviews.reviewText: Dove Deep Moisture Body Wash is a revelation for dry skin! This gentle body cleanser combines a rich, creamy texture with a heavenly fragrance, transforming every shower into a spa-like experience.The convenient pump dispenser makes application a breeze, and a little goes a long way. From the first use, it leaves my skin feeling incredibly soft and nourished. The deep moisture formula works wonders on even the driest skin, and the mild, comforting scent lingers delicately throughout the day.I appreciate that it's suitable for daily use, offering a perfect balance of hydration without any residue. If you're searching for a body wash that pampers and nourishes, Dove's Deep Moisture is an absolute winner. It's become a staple in my skincare routine, and I can't recommend it enough!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great for hand washing all year long
reviews.reviewText: This product is labeled as a body wash but we use it for hand washing. It has the perfect amount of moisturizer and light scent to use for hand washing all year long, especially during the Winter months.
I love this body wash. It is so silky and smells wonderful. I always use this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 24, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Lovely scent which leaves skin clean and soft
